title: Chicken ranch: a legal brothel in Nevada
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Social life and customs

description: A documentary film about the best known legalised brothel in America, the Chicken Ranch in Las Vegas. The film observes the day to day lives of the women who work in the brothel. Their average age is 21 and their earnings are split 50/50 with the house.
